same day delivery: Dublin – Cork – Dublin

Who We Are

Same Day Specialist in Time Sensitive Delivery

Insurance Goods in Transit Insured up to €100,000 per load

Speedex is a dedicated and fully licensed delivery service firm delivering on the Dublin/ Cork / Dublin route.

Speedex is now the sole provider of scheduled same day delivery on the Dublin – Cork – Dublin route. Goods from a parcel to a pallet, are collected before noon and delivered that same afternoon, providing customers with certainty and comfort that their goods have been delivered on time – every time.

Our track record for reliability and timely delivery, is based on knowing the right people and resources are strategically placed in Dublin and Cork to get the job done.

At Speedex every effort is made to exceed customer’s requirements and expectations through excellent service – that is our commitment.

What We Do

Same Day Service

Speedex specialise in the delivery of time sensitive and confidential documentation.

Large or small consignments including fragile goods. Consignments can be collected and delivered by Speedex or we can offer a more cost effective Depot to Depot service, where customers can deliver their goods to our depot in Dublin or Cork and can arrange collection from either.

  • Monday through Friday (excluding Bank & Public Holidays).
  • Speedex service depart both Cork & Dublin at 11.45am, arriving at Dublin & Cork respectively at c. 2.30pm.
  • Depot to Depot or Door to Door service available.

Warehouse and Distribution Service

Service Subtitle

Located in Ireland’s second largest City - easy access to and from all major routes. Ideal Distribution Centre for Munster Region.

6,200 sq. ft. Modern Secure Warehouse Unit. 200 pallet locations. High quality storage fully racked with RF system

  • Pick & Pack & Distribution Facility
  • Break Bulk & Distribution Facility
  • Stock Management Facility

Small Business Solutions

Service Subtitle

Trunking service to companies who have offices or warehouse facilities in both Cork and Dublin, enabling large savings on manpower and haulage costs.

  • facilities for Sales Representatives based in the south, for samples, point of sale material etc.
  • Office facilities available on request. WI FI, Telephone, FAX facilities.
  • Showroom facilities can be accommodated.
